item.author: Zara Kay
item.itunes:author: Zara Kay
item.title: Life After Islam with Zahraa (SeedsOfDoubt3)

enclosure.url: https://faithlesshijabi.github.io/Podcast/audio/Zara Kay - Life After Islam with Zahraa (SeedsOfDoubt3).mp3

item.description:
Zahraa is a 27yo French Canadian Lebanese, that escaped both an abusive family and marriage and enforced religion and is now living with her son and kicking ass.
First of our series, Life After Islam is a series dedicated to speaking with ExMuslims about their experiences, their views, advice to younger ExMuslims and just having a drink while we engage in insightful conversations with our growing community of ExMuslims.
Follow her on twitter: https://twitter.com/SeedsOfDoubt3
Support my passion and drive by becoming a patron, patreon account: https://www.patreon.com/zarakay

#ExMuslim #LifeAfterIslam #Islam

item.author: Zara Kay
item.itunes:author: Zara Kay
item.title: Life After Islam with Khulud

enclosure.url: https://faithlesshijabi.github.io/Podcast/audio/Zara Kay - Life After Islam with Khulud.mp3

item.description:
And our guest is today is Khulud, over a year ago last year Faithless Hijabi gathered funds to help Khulud (Under the alias Rania) to find her new life outside of an abusive family in Saudi Arabia. This podcast, we'll hear from her and her journey. She's a passionate feminist and writes for a column in Germany, she talks about women's issues within the Muslim community.
Life After Islam is a series dedicated to speaking with ExMuslims about their experiences, their views, advice to younger ExMuslims and just having a drink while we engage in insightful conversations with our growing community of ExMuslims.

item.author: Zara Kay
item.itunes:author: Zara Kay
item.title: Life after Islam with Omayma

enclosure.url: https://faithlesshijabi.github.io/Podcast/audio/Zara Kay - Life after Islam with Omayma.mp3

item.description:
Omayma is an Australian-Egyptian ExMuslim who is passionate about promoting secularist and humanist ideals. She is using her experience to encourage dialogue about apostasy taboos, normalising dissent and Human Rights violations in the name of religion. Her primary focus is female empowerment such as challenging gender roles, reclaiming bodily autonomy, creating opportunity and increasing independence.
Life After Islam is a series dedicated to speaking with ExMuslims about their experiences, their views, advice to younger ExMuslims and just having a drink while we engage in insightful conversations with our growing community of ExMuslims.
Follow her on twitter: https://twitter.com/omaymam_94
Support my passion and drive by becoming a patron, patreon account: https://www.patreon.com/zarakay

item.author: Zara Kay
item.itunes:author: Zara Kay
item.title: Life after Islam with Hassan, Somali-Kenyan

enclosure.url: https://faithlesshijabi.github.io/Podcast/audio/Zara Kay - Life after Islam with Hassan, Somali-Kenyan.mp3

item.description:
This episode we have our very first Somali ExMuslim, Hassan. Hassan is from Kenya and comes from the Somali community, Hassan has helped many ExMuslims in Kenya within the community and thus risking his life in the country. While he's worked endlessly for his freedom and saved up (he reached his goFundMe target along with his savings), Faithless Hijabi is hoping to help him raise his voice and share with us what it is like growing up as a man in a Somali community. We will talk about the culture, the inherent misogyny you're raised with, and how Hassan has managed to find his way out from a toxic community while taking care of his family ‚ù§Ô∏è
Life After Islam is a series dedicated to speaking with ExMuslims about their experiences, their views, advice to younger ExMuslims and just having a drink while we engage in insightful conversations with our growing community of ExMuslims.
Support my passion and drive by becoming a patron, patreon account: https://www.patreon.com/zarakay
